mapper.insert: insert into IM_MODEL (PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, S_DS_ID, T_MD_ID, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TYPE, BUILD_MODE, UPDATE_MODE,E_DS_ID,STATUS) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceDsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetMdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{buildMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{engineDsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update IM_MODEL set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_DS_ID = #{sourceDsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T_MD_ID = #{targetMdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, BUILD_MODE = #{buildMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_MODE = #{updateMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, E_DS_ID = #{engineDsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, S_DS_ID, T_MD_ID, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TYPE, BUILD_MODE, UPDATE_MODE,E_DS_ID,STATUS from IM_MODEL where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLG = '0'

select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, S_DS_ID, T_MD_ID, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TYPE, BUILD_MODE, UPDATE_MODE,E_DS_ID,STATUS from IM_MODEL where DEL_FLG = '0' ORDER BY CRT_TIME desc

select IM.PK_ID, IM.NAME, IM.DESCRIBE, IM.S_DS_ID, IM.T_MD_ID, IM.NOTE, IM.DEL_FLG, IM.CRT_USER, IM.CRT_TIME, IM.UPT_USER, IM.UPT_TIME, IM.TYPE, IM.BUILD_MODE, IM.UPDATE_MODE,IM.E_DS_ID,IM.STATUS,CD.NAME S_DS_NAME,IMM.NAME T_MD_NAME from IM_MODEL IM left join COM_DATASOURCE CD on CD.PK_ID = IM.S_DS_ID and CD.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN IM_METADATA IMM on IMM.PK_ID = IM.T_MD_ID and IMM.DEL_FLG = '0' where IM.DEL_FLG = '0' and IM.NAME like '%' || #{name} || '%' and IM.DESCRIBE like '%' || #{describe} || '%' and IM.T_MD_ID = #{targetMdId} and IM.TYPE = #{type} and IM.S_DS_ID = #{sourceDsId} and IM.CRT_TIME >= #{crtTimeStart} and #{crtTimeEnd} >= IM.CRT_TIME and IM.UPT_TIME >= #{uptTimeStart} and #{uptTimeEnd} >= IM.UPT_TIME and IM.STATUS = #{status} ORDER BY CRT_TIME desc

select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, S_DS_ID, T_MD_ID, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TYPE, BUILD_MODE, UPDATE_MODE,E_DS_ID,STATUS from IM_MODEL where NAME = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLG = '0'
select DICT_ID from t_gf_dict where DICT_TYPE_ID = 'IM_MODEL_UPDATE_TYPE' and DICT_NAME = #{updateMode}
select DICT_ID from t_gf_dict where DICT_TYPE_ID = 'IM_MODEL_BUILD_TYPE' and DICT_NAME = #{updateMode}
